abstract: The merger between the London Stock Exchange and the TMX Group would form one of the largest markets for mining and natural resource stocks, but it could face regulatory hurdles.
snippet: The merger between the London Stock Exchange and the TMX Group would form one of the largest markets for mining and natural resource stocks, but it could face regulatory hurdles.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA — The London Stock Exchange and the TMX Group, the parent company of the Toronto Stock Exchange, announced an all-share merger on Wednesday.

headline.main: London and Toronto Exchanges Announce Merger
